text: Privatization Warning: Don't let greed compromise our veterans' healthcare! 🚨💰 New study shows private-sector ER care is 21% more expensive than VHA care. 💸🏥 VHA providers receive extensive training to better understand and treat veteran-specific mental and physical problems. 💪🏽👨‍⚕️ Let's not sacrifice quality care for the sake of profit!
